title: Assessment component files: 2013
description: Assessment framework specification files for software suppliers developing management information systems (MIS).

title: Unregistered schools: Ofsted advice notes
description: Advice notes from Sir Michael Wilshaw HMCI to the Secretary of State for Education on unregistered schools.

title: Employing agency supply teachers
description: Guidance on the Agency Workers Regulations 2010, covering the employment of supply teachers from agencies.

title: Summer-born children: school admission
description: Guidance about school admissions for children born in the summer.

title: What maintained schools must publish online
description: The information that schools maintained by their local authorities must publish on their websites.

title: Returners Engagement Programme
description: Grant funding for schools in the North West and South East to support inactive teachers who wish to return to teaching.

title: Handling strike action in schools
description: Guidance on what to do when school staff go on strike.

title: Instructions for financial reporting on the Section 251 financial data collection 2012 to 2013
description: Instructions and guidance for financial reporting on the Section 251 financial data collection covering the funding period 2012 to 2013.

title: Asbestos management in schools
description: Guidance for school leaders, governors, local authorities and academy trusts.

title: SLASC 2018: technical specification
description: Technical specification and validation rules describing the requirements for the school-level annual school census (SLASC) 2018.
